definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: The pictures came out AWESOME, as evidenced by my husband’s reaction.
sentences.chinese: 老公的反应证实照片实在太棒了。

sentences.english: Husband thinks pisciculture early, took aquarium place in the sitting room then.

sentences.english: My husband just used one piece of newspaper and fire was on.
sentences.chinese: 我老公就用了一张报纸就将火点着了。

sentences.english: Or maybe you're always blanking out on your buddy's husband's name.
sentences.chinese: 或者你总是记不起来你闺蜜老公的名字？

sentences.english: Typically the marriages are arranged and women have two husbands.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，这里没有婚姻自由，一个女人有两个老公。

sentences.english: So I and my husband has been totally disrupted .
sentences.chinese: 所以我和老公的新完全被搅乱了。

sentences.english: Santa Claus suddenly remembered the elk hung bells around his neck.
sentences.chinese: 突然想起圣诞老公公的麋鹿脖子上挂着的铃铛。

sentences.english: I do not know male or female, but I like the husband.
sentences.chinese: 我也不知道是男是女，不过我和老公都喜欢的。

sentences.english: Your husband called and said you can buy anything you want.
sentences.chinese: 你老公打电话嚟话，你想买乜都得。

sentences.english: Husband, protect at you I gained flesh three, that clausal chain is some tight.
sentences.chinese: 老公，在你呵护下我长胖了三斤，那条项链有些紧。

sentences.english: My husband's here on business, so I decided to tag along with him.
sentences.chinese: 我老公在这儿做生意，所以我就跟来了。

sentences.english: Here Iciba which is recommended by my husband.
sentences.chinese: 爱词霸网站是我老公介绍给我的。

sentences.english: My husband told me I just can get one corn from one plant.
sentences.chinese: 我老公告诉我每颗玉米植物只能得到一个玉米棒子。

sentences.english: She found her husband cheated on her, so she wrote to the other woman to educate her.
sentences.chinese: 她发现她老公外面有人，就写信给那个小三想教训她。

sentences.english: Today, I had to break the news to my husband that I had miscarried our first child.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我告诉老公我们的第一个孩子流产了。

sentences.english: Know my husband when we are of marriageable age.
sentences.chinese: 相识我老公时我们都已经是婚龄年岁了。

definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
